thread.title: Liverpool FC transfer news: Reds ready to trigger £42m buy-out clause for Athletic Bilbao star Inaki Williams | Metro News
thread.title_full: Liverpool FC transfer news: Reds ready to trigger £42m buy-out clause for Athletic Bilbao star Inaki Williams | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Liverpool FC transfer news: Reds ready to trigger £42m buy-out clause for Athletic Bilbao star Inaki Williams | Metro News
text:
Liverpool ready to trigger £42.5m buy-out clause for Athletic Bilbao forward Inaki Williams gossip Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 11:55 am Inaki Williams has impressed for Athletic Bilbao (Picture: Getty) 
Liverpool are ready to trigger Athletic Bilbao forward Inaki Williams’ £42.5million buy-out clause, according to reports. 
Williams, who has scored 20 goals in 89 appearances for Bilbao since making his debut for the La Liga side in 2014, has been repeatedly linked with a move to Anfield. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
The 22-year-old spoke out following speculation of a move to Merseyside last week, insisting that while he’s flattered by the rumours he’s happy in Spain right now . 
‘If [Liverpool] are looking at me it’s because I’m doing things well. I’m very lucky,’ Williams told Sportium. 
‘If tomorrow I had to leave I would always be very honest with Athletic. They’ve given me everything. 
‘The first I would do is speak to the president [if I wanted to leave.]’ 
Liverpool are expected to bolster Jurgen Klopp’s squad this summer and Calciomercato say the club are ready to land a target in Bilbao’s Williams. Jurgen Klopp is said to be a big fan of Williams (Picture: Getty) Liverpool fixtures 
Leicester (A) – Mon 27 Feb Arsenal (H) – Sat 4 Mar Burnley (H) – Sun 12 Mar Man City (A) – Sun 19 Mar Everton (H) – Sat 1 Apr Bournemouth (H) – Wed 5 Apr
